articles.author: David McKenzie, Ghazi Balkiz
articles.title: The US helped prevent AIDS from being a death sentence in Africa. Now the epidemic is at a crossroads - CNN
articles.description: Fourteen-year-old Philasande Dayimani carries a burden that no child should carry. Last year, she started getting sores in her mouth and struggled to breathe. She says a clinic doctor told her to test for HIV.
articles.content:
Tembisa, South AfricaCNN
  — 
Fourteen-year-old Philasande Dayimani carries a burden that no child should carry.
